title: Dance for Me 1
description: The note said DANCE FOR ME.Annabelle McKenna hasn't danced since her daughter was born, but when Dimitri Novikov - superstar illusionist - challenges her to perform for him in his hotel room, she wants so badly to accept. She used to dance for thousands. Can she dance for just one man?DANCE FOR ME 1 is the first in a series of romance short stories, suitable for 18+.
author: Holly Stone
